think_procedure.step2: Understand the normal operation of 'max_wal_size', which is to set the maximum size of the WAL (Write-Ahead Logging) files.
think_procedure.step3: Research if 'max_wal_size' has any special values that alter its normal operation.
think_procedure.step4: Determine if setting 'max_wal_size' to a specific value (e.g., -1 or 0) disables or significantly changes its function.
think_procedure.step5: Conclude whether 'max_wal_size' is a 'special knob' based on the findings.
